#summary Step by Step Guide to Get Google consumer key and secrets.

=Google=

==Steps==

*1. Go to URL - [http://code.google.com/apis/accounts/docs/RegistrationForWebAppsAuto.html] and fill username and password if not already login. Create account if you don't have one.*

https://socialauth-android.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/twittersign.png


*2. Click manage your domains in Register your Domain section.In add domain section enter your real domain. Google requires real domain address. On adding you find your domain in Manage Registration section. On clicking it follow to procedure to verify the domain.

https://socialauth-android.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/twitterappform.png

*3. After verification


   * Contacts : read
   * Social Directory(Profiles) : read public 
   * Status : read/write 
   * rest : none


*4. You will then see the details page contains info about consumer key and secret. Note down key and secret and copy them in oauth_consumers.properties.
